entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
